templates.title: E-commerce Product Page
templates.description: Design and develop a responsive product page with filtering options, image gallery, and add-to-cart functionality.

templates.title: Landing Page Design
templates.description: Create a modern landing page for a SaaS product with responsive layout, animations, and email signup form.

templates.title: Dashboard UI Development
templates.description: Build a complete admin dashboard with data visualization, user management, and responsive layouts.

templates.title: Blog Platform API
templates.description: Develop a RESTful API for a blog platform with user authentication, post management, and comments.

templates.title: Mobile App UI Design
templates.description: Create a mobile app UI design for a fitness tracking application with clean and modern aesthetics.

templates.title: Full-Stack Social Platform
templates.description: Build a social media platform with user profiles, posts, comments, and real-time notifications.

templates.name: E-commerce Platform
templates.shortDescription: Build a full-featured e-commerce platform with product catalog, cart, and checkout
templates.longDescription: Create a complete e-commerce solution with user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment processing. Includes admin panel for inventory management.

templates.name: Task Management App
templates.shortDescription: Create a modern task management application with real-time collaboration
templates.longDescription: Build a Trello-like board with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project analytics.

templates.name: Blog Platform
templates.shortDescription: Build a modern blog platform with CMS features
templates.longDescription: Create a content management system for blogs with markdown editor, SEO optimization, comment system, and analytics dashboard.

templates.name: Real-time Chat Application
templates.shortDescription: Develop a scalable real-time messaging platform
templates.longDescription: Build a modern chat application with WebSocket support, group chats, file sharing, emoji reactions, and end-to-end encryption.
